example.description: This example attaches the specified Internet gateway to the specified VPC.

example.code: PS C:\> $vpc = New-EC2Vpc -CidrBlock 10.0.0.0/16 PS C:\> New-EC2InternetGateway | Add-EC2InternetGateway -VpcId $vpc.VpcId
example.description: This example creates a VPC and an Internet gateway, and then attaches the Internet gateway to the VPC.
